content.raw:
Hi, I have been having issues generating the robot models on gzweb, they are coming up as white models. (this happens only to specific models such as husky, turtlebot3, but not to pr2, pioneer..)

I have been building using the default branch with node version 4.2.6 per suggestion above and I'm running gazebo on ros kinetic. Is this build combination the best for ros kinetic?

Also, is it necessary to run "npm run deploy --- -m"? I'm getting npm errors using this but not when using "npm run deploy". Currently, I do this and then manually download the gazebo model repo into the assets directory and run webify_v2.py. Could this be the problem?
content.html:
Hi, I have been having issues generating the robot models on gzweb, they are coming up as white models. (this happens only to specific models such as husky, turtlebot3, but not to pr2, pioneer..)

I have been building using the default branch with node version 4.2.6 per suggestion above and I'm running gazebo on ros kinetic. Is this build combination the best for ros kinetic?

Also, is it necessary to run "npm run deploy --- -m"? I'm getting npm errors using this but not when using "npm run deploy". Currently, I do this and then manually download the gazebo model repo into the assets directory and run webify_v2.py. Could this be the problem?
